metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33656 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: When setting font with malicous data by ioctl cmd PIO_FONT,kernel will write memory out of bounds. It was discovered that the virtual terminal driver in the Linux kernel did not properly handle VGA console font changes, leading to an out-of-bounds write. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
